nodes.text: A Beast Rider accompanied Commander Gobee as he searched the tunnels under the Royal Palace of Iziz, the capital and only city of the Inner Rim world of Onderon. Together with Gobee, this Beast Rider was present in the tunnels when King Ommin of Onderon revealed himself, an existence that was only rumored to be true by the city-dwelling citizens of Iziz. Pursued by Ommin's dark side army, this Beast Rider and Gobee fled the tunnels to warn their fellow Riders, along with the Jedi Knights who were present on Onderon at the time, that the worshippers of Freedon Nadd were coming to engage them in battle.
